snippet: The visiting Philadelphia Flyers beat the Devils, 4-3, for their season-high fourth straight victory.
abstract: NHL Roundup; Philadelphia Flyers defeat New Jersey Devils, 4-3; other hockey scores noted.
lead_paragraph: The visiting Philadelphia Flyers beat the Devils, 4-3, for their season-high fourth straight victory.

headline.main: Overtime Goal Sinks Devils in Feisty Game With Flyers
headline.print_headline: Overtime Goal Sinks Devils in Feisty Game With Flyers
